page.title: 09Politics in Helford
page.content: GOVERNMENT Local Parish council with elections every 4 years to elect councillors to represent us up to county level. EDUCATION children up to the age of 11 attend the county primary schools at St Martin and Manaccan, then go on to Mullion or Helston comprehensives up to the age of 16 or 18, others attend the college of Higher and further education at Camborne. LAW AND ORDER the nearest Police station is at Helston,10 miles away. three community police based at Mullion patrol the area daily by car. Crime_ mainly thefts from houses and boats,recently drug abuse has become more common.
